text: Andrey Krasnov (born 6 July 1981) is a retired Kyrgyzstani footballer who played for various clubs in his country including Dordoi-Dynamo Naryn. He was a member of the Kyrgyzstan national football team. ==International career stats== ===Goals for senior national team=== {| class="wikitable" ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !!
